tasks.task: Operate agricultural equipment for storage improvement
subtasks: Navigate through fields to assess storage needs
Assemble and operate the Incrable Storage Machine
Adjust settings on the machine for optimal performance
Monitor storage levels and adjust as necessary
Maintain机器的正常运作，检查故障并及时维修
Inspect the Incrable Storage Machine for wear and tear
Lubricate moving parts of the machine
Check fluid levels and top up if necessary
Perform routine servicing tasks as per maintenance schedule
Replace any damaged or worn components
Evaluate current storage facilities and identify improvements
Implement climate control measures to regulate temperature and humidity
Arrange for proper ventilation and air circulation within storage spaces
Ensure adequate lighting for inventory management
Secure storage areas to prevent access by unauthorized personnel or animals
Plan routes for efficient movement of storage machines through fields
Coordinate with team members for flawless operation of multiple machines
Integrate new storage procedures with existing practices
Train staff on the use and benefits of the Incrable Storage Machine
Adapt existing processes to accommodate the new storage technology
